searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT T.PKID, T.PKIDFORACTION, T.CASE_CODE, T.CREATE_BY, T.ITEM_NAME, T.ITEM_MANAGER, T.CREATE_TIME, T.ITEM_BACK_TIME, T.ITEM_INPUT_TIME, T.ITEM_OUTPUT_TIME, T.ACTION_PRE_DATE, T.ITEM_STATUS, T.ITEM_ADDR_CODE, T.ITEM_CATEGORY, T.IS_DELETED, T.PROPERTY_ADDR, T.CREATE_BY_REAL_NAME, T.CREATE_BY_ORG_NAME, T.CREATE_BY_MOBILE, T.ITEM_MANAGER_REAL_NAME, T.ITEM_MANAGER_ORG_NAME, T.ITEM_MANAGER_MOBILE, T.TODAY, T.CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT C.PKID, M.PKID AS PKIDFORACTION, M.CASE_CODE, M.CREATE_BY, M.ITEM_NAME, M.ITEM_MANAGER, M.CREATE_TIME, M.ITEM_BACK_TIME, M.ITEM_INPUT_TIME, M.ITEM_OUTPUT_TIME, M.ACTION_PRE_DATE, M.ITEM_STATUS, M.ITEM_ADDR_CODE, M.ITEM_CATEGORY, M.IS_DELETED, P.PROPERTY_ADDR, (SELECT TOP 1 U.REAL_NAME FROM SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB U WHERE U.USER_ID=M.CREATE_BY AND U.ismain=1)CREATE_BY_REAL_NAME, (SELECT TOP 1 U.ORG_NAME FROM SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB U WHERE U.USER_ID=M.CREATE_BY AND U.ismain=1)CREATE_BY_ORG_NAME, (SELECT TOP 1 U.MOBILE FROM SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB U WHERE U.USER_ID=M.CREATE_BY AND U.ismain=1)CREATE_BY_MOBILE, (SELECT TOP 1 U.REAL_NAME FROM SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB U WHERE U.USER_ID=M.ITEM_MANAGER AND U.ismain=1)ITEM_MANAGER_REAL_NAME, (SELECT TOP 1 U.ORG_NAME FROM SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB U WHERE U.USER_ID=M.ITEM_MANAGER AND U.ismain=1)ITEM_MANAGER_ORG_NAME, (SELECT TOP 1 U.MOBILE FROM SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB U WHERE U.USER_ID=M.ITEM_MANAGER AND U.ismain=1)ITEM_MANAGER_MOBILE, GETDATE() TODAY, case when M.ITEM_CATEGORY = 'carded' then '身份证' when M.ITEM_CATEGORY = 'bankCard' then '银行卡' when M.ITEM_CATEGORY = 'propertyCard' then '产权证' when M.ITEM_CATEGORY = 'otherCard' then '他证' end CATEGORY FROM sctrans.T_MM_MATERIAL_ITEM M LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO P ON P.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE C ON C.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE )T WHERE T.IS_DELETED='N' <ifNotNull itemManagerId> AND T.ITEM_MANAGER = #itemManagerId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull inputTimeStart> and T.ITEM_INPUT_TIME >= #inputTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull inputTimeEnd> and T.ITEM_INPUT_TIME <= #inputTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull outputTimeStart> and T.ITEM_OUTPUT_TIME >= #outputTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull outputTimeEnd> and T.ITEM_OUTPUT_TIME <= #outputTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull backTimeStart> and T.ITEM_BACK_TIME >= #backTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull backTimeEnd> and T.ITEM_BACK_TIME <= #backTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull caseCode> AND T.CASE_CODE LIKE '%'+#caseCode#+'%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND T.PROPERTY_ADDR LIKE '%'+#propertyAddr#+'%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull itemCategory> AND T.ITEM_CATEGORY LIKE '%'+#itemCategory#+'%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull itemStatus> AND T.ITEM_STATUS LIKE '%'+#itemStatus#+'%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull itemManager> AND T.ITEM_MANAGER_REAL_NAME LIKE '%'+#itemManager#+'%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull createBy> AND T.CREATE_BY_REAL_NAME LIKE '%'+#createBy#+'%' </ifNotNull>
